assetProfile.address2: Kuwait Free Trade Zone PO Box 1668
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Hayat Communications Company K.S.C.P. engages in the trading and contracting of electrical and communication equipment in Kuwait, the GCC countries, India, and Africa. The company designs, supplies, builds, and manages various types of fixed line and wireless networks, such as equipment shelters, structural towers, green field structures, monopoles, and roof top structures; offers diesel generators, power systems and power banks, and ancillaries and accessories; and constructs data centers and guyed towers. It also provides camouflage solutions, fiber cable infrastructures, and hybrid power solutions; power solutions, including diesel generators, fuel tanks, and automatic transfer switches; and field service management software. In addition, the company offers radio network services; warehouses, logistics, and custom clearance services; network monitoring and operations, network field maintenance, technical support and process management, and support services; roll out services; logistics and document management, and fulfillment services; enterprise solutions; and services for mobile phones and paging systems, and wired and wireless telecommunication services. Further, it engages in the maintenance of telecommunication equipment and devices; contracting of communication tools, materials, and systems; information transfer and infrastructure contracting; trade, installation, management, operation, and maintenance of phone and communication devices, and the security, safety, and surveillance items; trading of communication lines and cards; marketing and leasing of communication devices and interior communication networks; establishment of information centers; and investment activities. Additionally, the company offers technical consultancy services; and establishes, owns, leases, and rents communication networks and towers. Hayat Communications Company K.S.C.P. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Safat, Kuwait.
